I'll have to remember to come back and post pics, but I couldn't wait to write a review.  I was recently window shopping and saw a super cute pink dress in a store window. The dress was over $200... because of the brand. I told my daughter I wouldn't pay that price for that dress... buuuutttt... if it was turquoise (my favorite color) I just might. I did an image search, and LUCKILY that brand did not have turquoise, but I found this one in my color.  I was very skeptical, because I've returned the last 6-ish dresses I've ordered from Amazon. I wear a size small in most things, but dresses like this, the chest is usually much too small because my top is not proportionate to a size small (34DDD). But if I go up, the rest of the dress is usually frumpy looking. This dress fits PERFECT!!!  It's true to size and it's extremely adjustable to fit larger and (I'm guessing) small chests. Seems very well made. So super cute!!!
love the open back with the support from the ties. perfect for someone large chested!

This dress is a very pretty golden yellow.  It has thin straps above the chest area that wrap around your neck.  There is another strap that ties around the waist. 评论概述: I feel so cute in this dress!
评论详情: I bought this in a medium. Amazon suggested I buy large based on others reviews, but I tend to purchase size small in dresses. My lower half is like a size 12, but my upper half is more like a 6. My bust is quite small. It turned out I needed this dress in size small, so I ordered a small and sent back the medium. Before sending back the medium, I tried both on multiple times. Due to the tying nature of every part of this dress, the only main differences in sizing are the size of the cups and the length of the skirt. If you are small busted, go for the size small even if your belly and butt are size 16 or larger.  The fabric of this feels wonderful, and I feel super cute in it. It is very flattering. The light pink floral was absolutely adorable. Sadly, that was the size medium I had to send back and does not come in size small at this time. I loved it so much, though, I plan to check back here often for that size to come available again. In the meantime, I am enjoying my light blue floral almost as much :)

I love this dress! The only con is the ties are rather flimsy and cut into my neck ( if you have any weight to your girls it’s gonna cut in as does every tie top ) also, the ties ripped off ( the ones that tie behind your back, not the neck ones) and I had to sew them on with reinforced stitching, not a big deal, although it shouldn’t be necessary the second wearing. That’s just subpar stitching. Overall, I’d definitely buy another one though.
Cute style, but it was such thin material that it’s unwearable

My only problem was that for an almost $30 dress it would have been nice to have the dress actually sewn correctly but hey machines am I right. Ordering another one soon in the hopes that one comes correctly.....quality check issues just to bring awareness🫶🏼
